div.style: display: inline-block; background-color: #d9e0e7; padding: 6px; margin: 4px; border: 1px solid #8da1b4; border-radius: 5px; line-height: 60%

div.p: description: If child or person has not been vaccinated, give Seasonal Influenza vaccine at 6 months of age, and then once a year.

blockquote.p: title: Immunize Patient for Seasonal influenza - No Doses at 6 months old
description: Provide Seasonal influenza immunizations – using the "Seasonal influenza vaccine immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (2 dose scheme)

tr.td: Should vaccinate patient for Seasonal influenza because no doses at 6 months old in a 2 dose scheme
Should vaccinate patient for Seasonal influenza because no doses at 6 months old in a 2 dose scheme

blockquote.p: title: Immunize Patient for Seasonal influenza - 1st Dose given 4 weeks ago
description: Provide Seasonal influenza immunizations – using the "Seasonal influenza vaccine immunization – 1 PREVIOUS" schedule (2 dose scheme)

tr.td: Should vaccinate patient for Seasonal influenza because 1st dose was given 4 weeks ago in a 2 dose scheme
"Date last Seasonal Influenza dose given" >= "4 weeks"
Should vaccinate patient for Seasonal influenza because 1st dose was given 4 weeks ago in a 2 dose scheme
Should vaccinate patient for Seasonal influenza because 1st dose was given 4 weeks ago in a 2 dose scheme

blockquote.p: title: Immunize Patient for Seasonal influenza - Annual Re-vaccination
description: Provide Seasonal influenza revaccination – using the "Seasonal influenza vaccine immunization – Annual dose" schedule (1 dose scheme)

tr.td: "Patient has completed Seasonal influenza primary series" = TRUE
Should Re-vaccinate patient for Seasonal influenza - Annual dose
"Date last Seasonal Influenza dose given" >= "1 year"
Should Re-vaccinate patient for Seasonal influenza - Annual dose
